description:
Clemont`s Magnemite attacked Clemont and his friends when they entered the gym because at the time the Citroid was the owner of the gym and it had orders to get rid of intruders. Clemont`s Magnemite did recognize Clemont though and smiled but still attacked.
It does know an electric attack but which move it is was not confirmed in the episode dialog.
name: Coil (Citron)
